landing.headingText: One space for all your learning.
landing.subheadingText: Learn from anywhere, anytime. Instant access to all courses and activities.

login.notRegisterUser_alert: The email you provided does not exist in our records. In case you have previously signed up using your social account, try logging in via the same provider.

resetPasswordSendOTP.resetPassword_subHeading: Enter your email to send a OTP (one-time password) to access your account.
resetPasswordSendOTP.cancelandGoBackbtn_txt: Cancel & Go Back to Log in

changePassword.resetPassword_subHeading2: One Time Password(OTP) has been sent to your registered Email, please enter OTP and New Password to reset the Password
changePassword.cancelandGoBackbtn_txt: Cancel & Go Back to Log in
changePassword.invalid_OTP: Please enter a valid 6 digit code
changePassword.password_rules: Password must meet the following criteria: Atleast 8 characters. Atleast 1 lowercase character. Atleast 1 uppercase character.Atleast 1 number. Atleast 1 special character
changePassword.password_mismatch: Password and Confirm password don't match
changePassword.invalid_VerificationCode2: Invalid verification code provided, please try again.
